works.description:
Blog posts which are carefully
constructed  
to higlight interesting aspects of monitor news and add a personal  
perspective to things. The website that is infringing my copyrights simply
 
rewords my content very slightly but still includes my personal comments
as  
if they are his own. My website is always attributed as a source but never
 
linked to. Google seems to pick up some of his posts before my own because
 
it is a blogspot blog and I feel my website is being unduly punished for  
content that this website is duplicating.
